data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XBCHYJBkL2YQ7kNvgHZxxOU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDY3rjtcOMprV-IVk4-ETTJGNgSmb_VfRt463bSsQ0bFw&oe=66389ACC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=F9sCcGhRzh8Q7kNvgG1ovzB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBB1f-OjrFEF2eVlhOF0bjujiZSHKH7c8PS4eE-tm-XxQ&oe=6638D11F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=b_TAmuCTFP4Q7kNvgF39adR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDsfN0JacHQGN6562inBD77cXeXZofGE9U3HBxI0G_PPA&oe=6638CFA4)
